resources.string:
Hey, to play this game you will need to insert numbers and guess the number I set. To give you hints, after each try, I will tell you how many digits you got right on the right position (Bulls, shown with B) and how many you got right but on wrong position (Cows, shown with C).

 Example: If secret number is 520 and you try 502, you will get 1 bull (for digit 5) and 2 cows (you guessed 0 and 2, but got them on the wrong positions).

 Good luck and press Start to begin!
Here will be shown your hint.
"You have surrendered in the face of evil!"
You have come here to try your luck again? Press start if so, mortal.
